items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable toast notification library for React Native. This library provides pre-defined toasts, such as success, error, and loading, along with custom and emoji options. Users can display toast messages anywhere in their app without wrapping the entire app in a provider.
items.title: muku534/react-native-toast: A lightweight and customizable toast notification library for React Native. This library provides pre-defined toasts, such as success, error, and loading, along with custom and emoji options. Users can display toast messages anywhere in their app without wrapping the entire app in a provider.
